alert.note: Alert for Beaver (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 03 at 6:12AM CDT until June 04 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Cimarron River at Forgan 8N affecting Beaver County. For the Cimarron River...including Forgan 8N...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Cimarron River at Forgan 8N. * WHEN...From this morning to tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 5.0 feet, Expect minor overflows of low lying banks along the cimarron river in northern beaver county. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 4.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 2.2 feet early Thursday morning. - Action stage is 4.0 feet. - Flood stage is 5.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this morning at 1100 AM CDT.
